scripts.build: npm run policy-check && npm run build:genver && npm run build:compile && npm run lint && npm run build:docs
scripts.build:ci: npm run build:genver && lerna run build:compile:min --stream
scripts.build:full: npm run build:genver && npm run build:full:compile && npm run lint && npm run build:docs
scripts.bump-version: lerna version minor --no-push --no-git-tag-version && npm run build:genver
scripts.clean: lerna run clean --stream --parallel && npm run clean:docs && npm run clean:nyc
scripts.postinstall: npm run postinstall:lerna && (npm run postinstall:fluid-build || true) && (npm run postinstall:r11s || true)
scripts.lint: lerna run lint --no-sort --stream && npm run sort:lint
scripts.lint:fix: lerna run lint:fix --no-sort --stream && npm run sort-package-json
scripts.policy-check: cd ../../tools/repo-policy-check && npm install && npm run policy-check
scripts.policy-check:full: cd ../../tools/repo-policy-check && npm install && npm run policy-check
scripts.postinstall:fluid-build: cd ../../tools/fluid-build && npm i && npm run build
scripts.restart: docker-compose restart gateway && docker-compose restart alfred && docker-compose restart deli && docker-compose restart scriptorium && docker-compose restart foreman && docker-compose restart paparazzi
scripts.test:ci: npm run test:report;t1=$?;npm run test:copyresults; exit $t1
scripts.test:ci:coverage: npm run test:coverage;t1=$?;npm run test:copyresults; exit $t1
scripts.watch: concurrently "npm run watch:tsc" "npm run watch:esnext" "npm run watch:webpack"
